statements: DELETE FROM StudentReports WHERE student_id = 1 AND course_id = 101;
DELETE FROM StudentReports WHERE completion_status = TRUE AND performance_rating < 70;
DELETE FROM students WHERE student_id = 100 AND enrollment_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM courses WHERE completion_date < '2021-12-31' AND instructor_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM CompletionRates WHERE student_id = 123 AND course_id = 456;
DELETE FROM Enrollment WHERE completion_status = false;
